nodes.name: Fundraising

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns the total amount of donations made by a specific address.
 @param _donor The address we want to get the donations.
nodes.name: donationsOf

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "To retire the donations the fundraising period must expire"

arguments.value: To retire the donations the fundraising period must expire

nodes.name: Fundraising

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns the total amount of donations made by a specific address.
 @param _donor The address we want to get the donations.
nodes.name: donationsOf

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "To retire the donations the fundraising period must expire"

arguments.value: To retire the donations the fundraising period must expire

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "To retire the donations the fundraising period must expire"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "To retire the donations, the contract should have collected at least the minimum goal"

arguments.value: To retire the donations, the contract should have collected at least the minimum goal

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "To retire the donations, the contract should have collected at least the minimum goal"

params.deadline: number of seconds the fundraising period will be active/open
params.minimumGoal: the minimum amount of wei it must be collected in order to allow the owner to withdraw the funding

params._donor: The address we want to get the donations.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

methods.constructor: Create the contract, initilize the fundraising attributes

donationsOf(address).notice: Returns the total amount of donations made by a specific address.

userdoc.notice: This contract will allow to make a crowd fundraising using ethers, please see the readme for the rules considered in the contract.
